::Decadel::

     Decadel jumps to the side, avoiding Depth Charge's stun g=
un.

     He started running at Depth Charge, with his flamethrowers.  Then=
, Decadel got up close, and waved his fire all around, but then..........Th=
en..........Oh crap.....Outta flames!!!!  Decadel's flamethrowers were his =
favourite weapons, his special weapons, his best weapons!!!  He loved them.=
....Now, he was out.  He had two choices, use his shoulder cannons, or, run=
 for cover.

      No, using his cannons up close would cause a deadly outb=
irst of plasma energy.

    Decadel then thought of a third choice!!!!  Bea=
st mode!!!  He could go into beast mode!!!

    He turned into worm mode, a=
nd then leaped down into the ground.  Hmm...Odd........Was it those energon=
 bars he had lastnight???

     Decadel screamed trying to wriggle undergro=
und, "Man, I gotta excersize!!" 

    He couldn't fit down the whole, and h=
alf his body was sticking out, just waiting to be shot at.

::Lavacons::

 =
     Astral laughed.

      "Ha, well, any enemy of the Maximals right now =
is our enemy!!!!!!  Lavacons, attack!!!!!" He screamed, pointing his gun at=
 DevilDuer.

       Recklessa cackled in evil laughter.

     "It's party t=
ime!!!!!  Hit it Lavacons!!!" She said, and started firing her gatling guns=
 at Dark One.

        Starlight pulled out her fire crossbow, and fired tw=
o shots at Breakdown, probably missing him because he was a vehicle.

     =
  Griplash drew out his lava blade, twirled it a couple times to show off, =
and then began running towards Pyro, ready to strike fast.

        Fenox s=
oluted Astral, and blasted a couple optic burn lazers at Hiss and Scavanger=
.

     And, Astral lands down, facing DevilDuer 25 feet away and then, Ast=
ral grabbed his machine gun in right hand and pistol in left hand, and fire=
d at DevilDuer(Remember they are flame rounds, just in case, Lavacons weapo=
ns are all based on lava or flames)
